basics.name: Eduardo Davalos
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: A PhD Student focused on scalable multimodal learning analytics and AI

work.name: American Red Cross
work.summary: Developed a web application to help the American Red Cross to manage their emergency stations

work.name: St. Mary's Engineering Department
work.summary: Mentored, directed, and guided students throughout a summer program, teaching them the principles of robotics.

work.name: St. Mary's Learning Assistance Center
work.summary: Instructed and guided students in programming and physics courses, helping them to understand complex concepts and improve their grades.

education.institution: St.Mary's University, San Antonio, TX, USA
St.Mary's University, San Antonio, TX, USA

publications.name: 3D Gaze Tracking for Studying Collaborative Interactions in Mixed-Reality Environments
publications.summary: Developed computational pipeline leveraging from off-the-shelf computer vision algorithms to perform 3D gaze tracking in mixed-reality environments.

publications.name: A First Step Using Machine Learning Methods to Enhance Interaction Analysis for Embodied Learning Environments
publications.summary: Developed AI techniques and software tools to analyze multimodal data from embodied learning environments involving the interaction analysis.

publications.name: ChimeraPy: A Scientific Distributed Streaming Framework for Real-time Multimodal Data Retrieval and Processing
publications.summary: Created a multimedia data processing framework for real-time data retrieval and processing in distributed environments.

publications.name: Identifying Gaze Behavior Evolution via Temporal Fully-Weighted Scanpath Graphs
publications.summary: Identified gaze-based behaviors along the temporal dimension through the use of graphs involving fixated objects in a mixed-reality environment.

projects.name: RedForest
projects.summary: EdTech Platform, empowered by AI and multimodal learning analytics

projects.name: ChimeraPy: A Scientific Distributed Streaming Framework for Real-time Multimodal Data Retrieval and Processing
projects.summary: ChimeraPy is a multimedia data processing framework for real-time data retrieval and processing in distributed environments.

projects.name: SKORE (Smart Keyboard Operated by Robotic Educator)
projects.summary: SKORE is a piano tutor capable of teaching music theory and piano playing to students of all ages.
